title: Faces
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey, Shioriko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Welcome, Mari-san. I see you didn’t come by helicopter today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah. I forgot to get permission from the school administration beforehand.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m happy you remembered.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>So, Shioriko, the aerial trapeze we did on my helicopter before was fun, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Uh... Was it... fun? I’m sorry. My memory is a bit hazy...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You were squealing so much and looked like you were enjoying yourself! I enjoyed it too. So let’s do it again today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Huh!? Didn’t you say you didn’t come here by helicopter!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I came by helicopter and landed at a nearby heliport! Odaiba has everything, huh! Come on, let’s go, Shioriko!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Wait, uh, Mari-san! Did I really enjoy the aerial trapeze!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes, very much! You were calling out your sister’s name at some point, but you seemed to be having fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah... Now that you mention it, I felt like I saw you and my sister’s faces overlapping...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I see! I got it! Shioriko, you must have wanted your sister to join us on the aerial trapeze, too, right? Leave it to me! I’ll invite your sister as well!~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
